title: about me<hr>
text:
Hi! I'm Cyi (or Banami). I'm a 15 year old who knows nothing about themselves. I occasionally draw traditionally and rarely digitally, may program or code at times, but I'm horrible at that (a lot of googling and research) and overall an incredibly awkward person.

Really funny data below here
Gender: Transfem
Birthday: 15/11/2008
Misc:
ADHD user1!
I'm not the best at socializing and may suck at talking to people.
My mental status is incredibly messy, and at times I may have trouble comprehending my feelings or just not be in a good state (but that's when I begin to overthink).
